title: Pathianin khawngaihin
lyrics:
Pathianin khawngaihin,
Chhandamna kim a siam;
A khawngaih vanga thlang chhuakin,
Misualte a chhandam.

Rin vangin chhandam inn ni,
Rinin, rinin;
Rinin nangni thawh ni lovin,
Rinin, nangmahni thawh a ni si lo va,
A ni lo, a ni lo,
Ni se, mi'n an chhuang ang,
Pathian thil pek a ni;
Pathian thil pek a ni, (3)
Thil pek a ni.

Pathian khawngaihna chu,
Kristaa a lo lang;
Kraws zahthlak tak chungah tuarin,
A khawngaih a hriattir.

Ringtu zawng zawng hnenah,
Krista chu a inlar;
Khawngaihnain chhandam an hmu,
Pathian fa an lo ni.
